articles.title: Greenlanders express fear and indignation as Trump eyes territory - BBC
articles.description: Greenlanders tell the BBC they have no interest in becoming American as the White House restates its desire for annexation.
articles.content:
Alicia Curry,in London,and
Adrienne Murray,in Copenhagen
Mia Chemnitz says "the people of Greenland do not want to become American"
"The people of Greenland do not want to become American," Mia Ch… [+5917 chars]
